Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Detected a collision! [STOP%d]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: 产品确认

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Can not follow position cmd! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please clear the error and try again. If the issue persists, contact the manufacturer for assistance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Can not follow tcp cmd! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please clear the error and try again. If the issue persists, contact the manufacturer for assistance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: During operation, an unexpected joint brake activation occurred! [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please clear the error and try again. If the issue persists, contact the manufacturer for assistance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joints position is out of extreme range! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Enter safety handling mode, manually return to within the limit, and try again.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Robot is in emergency stop state. [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Release the emergency stop button and press the reset button.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The user's real-time commands exceed the system's response speed, causing the real-time command buffer to overflow! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust the user code and improve its real-time performance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Real-time commands from the user were not received in time! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust the user code and improve its real-time performance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The Conveyor that being enabled is not online. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Make sure the conveyor that being enabled is online

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint count is unmatched! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Check the algorithm configuration version and ensure it matches the arm model. If the issue persists, contact the manufacturer.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Robot pose has slopover safe virtualwall! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the virtualwall range.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Pose has slopover reduce virtualwall! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the virtualwall range.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: SCU has triggered a protective stop! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Resolve the external error that caused the protective stop and try again.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The robot is in STO state! [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Resolve the external error that caused the robot to enter the STO state and try again.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The safety door signal has been triggered! [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Close the safety door, clear the error, and resume operation.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The robot is in STO emergency stop state! [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: ECODE_STO_EMGCY_STOP_ERROR，软件待补充

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The system's CPU usage is high.! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust the user program.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: High memory usage! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust the user program.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint exceed the temperature: Joint [%d] [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: ECODE_EXCEED_TEMPERATURE，软件待补充

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The robot is in an emergency stop state! [STOP0]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Release the emergency stop button and press the reset button.

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please refer to the following SCU error codes.

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please refer to the following SCU error codes.

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please refer to the following SCU error codes.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: SCU detected a joint limit exceeded! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the joint range.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: SCU detected a tcp limit exceeded! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the tcp range.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: The robotic arm has experienced self-collision! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust the robotic arm's movement trajectory to avoid collisions.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Robot pose has slopover safe workspace limits! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the safe workspace range.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Pose has slopover reduce workspace limit! [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Please return to within the safe workspace range.

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: ECODE_INTERPOLATE_POSITION_ERROR，软件待补充

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: _interpolaterTorque failed! [STOP1]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: ECODE_INTERPOLATE_TORQUE_ERROR，软件待补充

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Singular configuration. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Infeasible cartesian trajectory or enable singularity avoidance.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint position or torque limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust way-points or reduce trajectory speed/acceleration.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint position limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Adjust way-points or modify the trajectory path.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint torque limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory acceleration or speed or both.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint speed limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory speed.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint acceleration limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory acceleration or speed(cartesian trajectory).

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint jerk limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory jerk

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Motion limit exceeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory speed or acceleration or both.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Inverse kinematics failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Infeasible cartesian trajectory.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Inverse position kinematics failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Change the target or adjust the initial joint configuration.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Illegal input values for trajectory planning. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Input appropriate values for trajectory planning.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: MoveJ trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(path/speed/acceleration/etc.).

Attribute.value: MoveL trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(path/speed/acceleration/etc.).

Attribute.value: MoveC trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(path/speed/acceleration/etc.).

Attribute.value: Trajectory blend planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify blend positions/speeds/accelerations.

Attribute.value: SpeedJ trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(speed/acceleration/duration).

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: SpeedL trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(speed/acceleration/duration).

Attribute.value: ServoJ trajectory planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(command/gain/lookahead/duration).

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify trajectory inputs(command/gain/lookahead/duration).

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Unknown move type. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Specify an existing move type.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Unplanned trajectory. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Plan the trajectory successfully before moving.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Illegal input values for trajectory interpolation. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Input allowable values for trajectory interpolation.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Trajectory interpolation failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify the trajectory.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Singular configuration during self-motion. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Self-motion cannot proceed further.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Unable to execute self motion. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Self-motion is unavailable from current configuration.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint position limit exceeded during self-motion. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reverse the moving direction.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint speed limit exceeded during self-motion. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce the moving speed.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Self-motion interpolation failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Self-motion cannot proceed further.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Joint torque limit exceeded during self-motion. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce the moving speed/acceleration.

Attribute.name: error_description
Attribute.value: Conveyor track planning failed. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Modify conveyor track planning inputs.

Attribute.value: Successive joint position commands differ too much. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Infeasible trajectory.

Attribute.value: Cartesian speed limit exeeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.name: error_solution
Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory speed.

Attribute.value: Cartesian acceleration limit exeeded. [STOP2]

Attribute.value: Reduce trajectory speed/acceleration.

Attribute.value: Infeasible cartesian trajectory.
